author: Meena Iyer
title: Sunny Deol breaks down like a baby
text:
Ajit Deol, who is Dharmendra's favourite brother and who lives in the same bungalow as the actor has been ill for a while now.
Two days, the doctors attending to the veteran were deeply concerned about his failing health. When Sunny Deol heard that his uncle's condition was far from good, the actor wept like a baby.
READ: Both my sons want to be actors: Sunny Deol
He was even contemplating calling off the shoot of his latest directorial venture. However, because the cast and crew were on their way to a location in South Mumbai, Sunny went ahead and shot. Ajit is Abhay Deol's father. Family sources say that Sunny has always been very close to his uncle. In fact, even when his uncle had been diagnosed with a heart condition earlier, it was Sunny who kept vigil at the hospital. This time around too, he is the one who is completely clued in to his uncle's health status.
